thread.title: Win a Stay at a Scottish Castle That's Straight Out of Beauty and the Beast | Travel + Leisure
thread.title_full: Win a Stay at a Scottish Castle That's Straight Out of Beauty and the Beast | Travel + Leisure

title: Win a Stay at a Scottish Castle That's Straight Out of Beauty and the Beast | Travel + Leisure
text:
Win a Stay at This Castle Straight Out of 'Beauty and the Beast' 
HomeAway is giving away a stay at a Scottish castle to celebrate the new Disney movie. HomeAway by Jessica Plautz 
If living out a fairy tale is on your bucket list, HomeAway would like you to be their guest . 
The vacation rental service is partnering with Disney to offer one lucky winner—and 20 of their closest friends—a five-night stay at a romantic 14th-century Scottish castle in celebration of the upcoming movie “Beauty and the Beast.” 
The winner and their friends will get an all-expenses-paid trip to Duns, Scotland, where they can create their own real-life fairy tale—hopefully without the curse and the imprisonment. 
The live action movie, starring Emma Watson as Belle and Dan Stevens as the Beast, comes out on March 17. 
“The group will have the entire castle and its 1,200 acres to themselves to enjoy as they wish and can partake in a variety of activities ranging from archery to falconry,” according to HomeAway . “Or, they may prefer to dance, sing, read books, or perhaps even talk to the furniture and hope it will talk back.” 
To enter the contest , you must be from the U.S., France, Germany, or the U.K. The entry period ends March 31, 2017. Scroll Down
